content: We’d started iOS-only first because we wanted to be able to iterate on our product quickly — and we were just two engineers. As we entered 2012, though, it was time to expand to multiple platforms. In typical Instagram style, our Android app was built in three months with three engineers, two of whom learned Android to complete the project along with Philip, who joined us from building Gowalla’s Android app and leads Instagram’s mobile efforts to this day.
